otherNames: Wo De Wudi Fan Taolu, My Invincible Counter-Routine, Wǒ De Wúdí Fǎn Tàolù, 我的无敌反套路
synopsis: Don't talk to me about morality, winning is the only thing that matters. Li Xiangyang might use dirty tricks, might be despicable, might be shameless, so what? If you have the ability, beat me! I have no shame, that's why I'm invincible! They say bad boys attract girls, but sorry beauties, this handsome guy is temporarily not interested in love!
